meanings.sent1: The crushproof case protected my phone from getting squashed in my bag.
meanings.sent2: The crushproof suitcase survived being thrown around by the airport staff.
meanings.sent3: I wish my homework was crushproof so my dog couldn't eat it!
meanings.sent4: Her crushproof determination to succeed was like an unbreakable shield.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's crushproof armor gleamed in the sunlight, invincible against any force.

meanings.definition: Designed to resist damage from being crushed.
meanings.sent1: The crushproof packaging kept the fragile items safe during shipping.
meanings.sent2: The crushproof water bottle bounced off the ground without a dent.
meanings.sent3: The crushproof umbrella refused to give in to the strong wind, almost like it had a mind of its own!
meanings.sent4: Her crushproof resolve in the face of adversity was an inspiration to all.
meanings.sent5: The fortress walls stood crushproof against the enemy's relentless siege, unyielding and unbroken.
